name: Flying Fish:Perfect Escape
description:
With the help of indoor items, help the Flying Fish get rid of the bad luck of being cooked and successfully return to the sea.

Game Features
▲More than 100 level designs, exquisite control + space prediction, so you can't stop!
▲Wires, fans, monkeys, all kinds of weird props to help you pass the level
▲Cute dolphins, ferocious sharks, funny porcupines, 60 kinds of fish waiting for you to unlock
▲Rich maps, accompany the salted fish through different escape scenes
▲Fish will eventually evolve into dragon, so let’s explore the evolutionary process!

How to play:
▲Swipe for jump
▲Let the Flying Fish stick to various indoor objects before continuing to jump
▲Keep jumping and finally return to the sea
